# NSSplitView.DividerStyle.thin

**Case**

A thin style divider displays between subviews.

## Declaration

```swift
case thin
```

## Constants

- **NSSplitView.DividerStyle.thick**: A thick style divider displays between subviews.
- **NSSplitView.DividerStyle.paneSplitter**: A thick style divider with a 3D appearance displays between subviews.
